nodes.text: Tatrang VII was a ringed gas giant–type planet with eleven moons that was located within the Tatrang system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Tammuz sector. It occupied the seventh orbital position around the system's star, the red giant Tatrang. The planet was considered to hold little economic value.

Tatrang VII was first mentioned in the 1992 sourcebook Planets of the Galaxy, Volume Two, which was written by John Terra for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Tatrang system, and therefore Tatrang VII, in grid square U-14.
